name: Disable-CoreIsolation
commandPattern: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\DeviceGuard\Scenarios\HypervisorEnforcedCodeIntegrity' -Name 'Enabled' -Type DWord -Value 0 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype off; Write-Host "Core Isolation désactivé" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Warning "Redémarrage requis. Impact sécurité: protection contre exploits kernel réduite"
